timeline.message:
Clarify nullability of getGameInstance method

Due to 20w22a+ dedicated server game instance changes, the game instance may not always be available.

timeline.bodyText: Imo we should deprecate this method in the future. some game logic just happen in a static context.
timeline.author: liach
